resources.string: Welcome to the Sakhi Safe Application!
We are ready to assist you anytime, anywhere.
Sharing your location with someone you trust is a smart way to enhance safety, especially when walking alone.
An application that will enhance your security and safety in various situations.
Your safety and security are our priority.
We respect your privacy, and your location will only be shared with your consent.
An application that will enhance your security and safety in various situations.
We are ready to assist you anytime, anywhere.
Your safety and security are our priority.
Sharing your location with someone you trust is a smart way to enhance safety, especially when walking alone.
We respect your privacy, and your location will only be shared with your consent.
Providing solutions and assistance in situations that may threaten or make you feel unsafe, especially when walking alone in quiet places or at night.
